title: Favorite GTA Game
content: what grand theft auto game is your favorite?Rorie

title: Re: Favorite GTA Game
content:
I've only played the first of the 3D ones and Vice City. Vice City seemed better to me, although I'm not really a fan of the series. Cruising around the city is fun, though.3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

content:

title: Re: Favorite GTA Game
content:
All have their weaknesses, I can't decide. -----------------

title: Re: Favorite GTA Game
content:
Well, I figured I'd just vote 3, since it's the first game of the new series, making it the most renewing.
GTA 2 added some things to GTA as well, but it removed the motor cycles, and I suppose it's similar for the new series, like Djaser says.
Maybe if they'll bundle the new trilogy (the one game is just PSP and PS2 in the near future, I think), I'll get it and play them all sometime.Retodon8

title: Re: Favorite GTA Game
content:
In San Andreas, you can play in 2 player mode.
and sometimes then, i play it with my brother. im laughing so hard sometimes because it's just so funny.
you can just get in a train..., on a bmx... you can get in boats... you can even get in planes... all such things.
so cool[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-wink.gif[/img]

i'll vote for that one.
